bibdata.title: IEEE Draft ANSI Standard for RF Immunity of Audio Office Equipment to General Use Transmitting Devices With Transmitter Power Levels up to 8 Watts
IEEE Draft ANSI Standard for RF Immunity of Audio Office Equipment to General Use Transmitting Devices With Transmitter Power Levels up to 8 Watts
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC63-9/D3.4 Jan 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard provides recommended test methods and limits for assuring the RF immunity of office equipment to general use transmitters with transmitter power up to 8 watts.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
